title: Destruction Bringer (Metal Music Pack)
description: This music pack contains 10 songs in heavy/progressive metal genre with post-industrial, dark synthwave and glitch elements.
longDescription:
Destruction Bringer is a heavy/progressive metal album with 10 tracks that draws extensively from the post-industrial, dark synthwave, and glitch themes. To enable developers and other artists to capture seamless transitions between scenes and the songs, these tracks were all written in the same key. The themes and genres of these 10 tunes can be divided into:


  • Boss Fight Theme 01
  • Boss Fight Theme 02
  • Boss Fight Theme 03
  • Boss Fight Theme 04
  • Boss Fight Theme 05
  • Boss Fight Theme 06
  • Encounter Theme 01
  • Encounter Theme 02
  • Encounter Theme 03
  • Main Menu Theme


You can watch the album trailer on Youtube by following this link.


Total album duration: 25 Minutes

Loop Files: Available & Provided

CUE Files For Unreal Engine 4 & 5: Available and Provided
